name: Ukranian conflict
description: Ukranian conflict is a 2D shooter+roguelike+action game, with a unique choice of heroes. Bosses, tanks, soldiers, potions, weapons, shields and more await you in endless random games. you can play with a machine gun or a shotgun, for former or real politicians, no one forbids you anything! Ukranian conflict will never bore you, because all the rooms and objects appear in a random order, thanks to which each new game is different from the previous one!
